HOME ARCHIVE

Tuesday 5th December 2023

17.30 – 19.30

December’s FLOAT meetup will coincide with the opening of ame’s Winter Process exhibition at Dai Hall.

Come and experience the installations and meet the artists.

There is also a free workshop, ‘Communal Sounds’, running afterwards by KP Culver. Details and sign up

Where?

Dai 大 Hall (The Piazza, Unit 29/30, Victoria Lane, Huddersfield HD1 2QF)
